entry.title: The importance of the idea of ``map``: you stop thinking about control structure. And you start to think about operation on the aggregate, the list.
entry.content:
The importance of the idea of map: you stop thinking about control structure. And you start to think about operation on the aggregate, the list.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2QgZVYI3tDs&t=22m0s
